Now after<S>310</S> the death<S>4194</S> of Moses<S>4872</S> the servant<S>5650</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> it came to pass, that the LORD<S>3068</S> spake<S>559</S> unto Joshua<S>3091</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Nun<S>5126</S>, Moses'<S>4872</S> minister<S>8334</S>, saying<S>559</S>,
Moses<S>4872</S> my servant<S>5650</S> is dead<S>4191</S>; now therefore arise<S>6965</S>, go over<S>5674</S> this Jordan<S>3383</S>, thou, and all this people<S>5971</S>, unto the land<S>776</S> which I do give<S>5414</S> to them, even to the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>.
Every place<S>4725</S> that the sole<S>3709</S> of your foot<S>7272</S> shall tread upon<S>1869</S>, that have I given<S>5414</S> unto you, as I said<S>1696</S> unto Moses<S>4872</S>.
From the wilderness<S>4057</S> and this Lebanon<S>3844</S> even unto the great<S>1419</S> river<S>5104</S>, the river<S>5104</S> Euphrates<S>6578</S>, all the land<S>776</S> of the Hittites<S>2850</S>, and unto the great<S>1419</S> sea<S>3220</S> toward the going down<S>3996</S> of the sun<S>8121</S>, shall be your coast<S>1366</S>.
There shall not any man<S>376</S> be able to stand<S>3320</S> before<S>6440</S> thee all the days<S>3117</S> of thy life<S>2416</S>: as I was with Moses<S>4872</S>, so I will be with thee: I will not fail<S>7503</S> thee, nor forsake<S>5800</S> thee.
Be strong<S>2388</S> and of a good courage<S>553</S>: for unto this people<S>5971</S> shalt thou divide for an inheritance<S>5157</S> the land<S>776</S>, which I sware<S>7650</S> unto their fathers<S>1</S> to give<S>5414</S> them. <sup>unto this: or, thou shalt cause this people to inherit the land, etc</sup>
Only be thou strong<S>2388</S> and very<S>3966</S> courageous<S>553</S>, that thou mayest observe<S>8104</S> to do<S>6213</S> according to all the law<S>8451</S>, which Moses<S>4872</S> my servant<S>5650</S> commanded<S>6680</S> thee: turn<S>5493</S> not from it to the right hand<S>3225</S> or to the left<S>8040</S>, that thou mayest prosper<S>7919</S> whithersoever thou goest<S>3212</S>. <sup>prosper: or, do wisely</sup>
This book<S>5612</S> of the law<S>8451</S> shall not depart<S>4185</S> out of thy mouth<S>6310</S>; but thou shalt meditate<S>1897</S> therein day<S>3119</S> and night<S>3915</S>, that thou mayest observe<S>8104</S> to do<S>6213</S> according to all that is written<S>3789</S> therein: for then thou shalt make<S>6743</S> thy way<S>1870</S> prosperous<S>6743</S>, and then thou shalt have good success<S>7919</S>. <sup>have: or, do wisely</sup>
Have not I commanded<S>6680</S> thee? Be strong<S>2388</S> and of a good courage<S>553</S>; be not afraid<S>6206</S>, neither be thou dismayed<S>2865</S>: for the LORD<S>3068</S> thy God<S>430</S> is with thee whithersoever thou goest<S>3212</S>.
Then Joshua<S>3091</S> commanded<S>6680</S> the officers<S>7860</S> of the people<S>5971</S>, saying<S>559</S>,
Pass<S>5674</S> through<S>7130</S> the host<S>4264</S>, and command<S>6680</S> the people<S>5971</S>, saying<S>559</S>, Prepare<S>3559</S> you victuals<S>6720</S>; for within three<S>7969</S> days<S>3117</S> ye shall pass over<S>5674</S> this Jordan<S>3383</S>, to go in<S>935</S> to possess<S>3423</S> the land<S>776</S>, which the LORD<S>3068</S> your God<S>430</S> giveth<S>5414</S> you to possess<S>3423</S> it.
And to the Reubenites<S>7206</S>, and to the Gadites<S>1425</S>, and to half<S>2677</S> the tribe<S>7626</S> of Manasseh<S>4519</S>, spake<S>559</S> Joshua<S>3091</S>, saying<S>559</S>,
Remember<S>2142</S> the word<S>1697</S> which Moses<S>4872</S> the servant<S>5650</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> commanded<S>6680</S> you, saying<S>559</S>, The LORD<S>3068</S> your God<S>430</S> hath given you rest<S>5117</S>, and hath given<S>5414</S> you this land<S>776</S>.
Your wives<S>802</S>, your little ones<S>2945</S>, and your cattle<S>4735</S>, shall remain<S>3427</S> in the land<S>776</S> which Moses<S>4872</S> gave<S>5414</S> you on this side<S>5676</S> Jordan<S>3383</S>; but ye shall pass<S>5674</S> before<S>6440</S> your brethren<S>251</S> armed<S>2571</S>, all the mighty<S>1368</S> men of valour<S>2428</S>, and help<S>5826</S> them; <sup>armed: Heb. marshalled by five</sup>
Until the LORD<S>3068</S> have given<S>5117</S> your brethren<S>251</S> rest<S>5117</S>, as he hath given you, and they also have possessed<S>3423</S> the land<S>776</S> which the LORD<S>3068</S> your God<S>430</S> giveth<S>5414</S> them: then ye shall return<S>7725</S> unto the land<S>776</S> of your possession<S>3425</S>, and enjoy<S>3423</S> it, which Moses<S>4872</S> the LORD'S<S>3068</S> servant<S>5650</S> gave<S>5414</S> you on this side<S>5676</S> Jordan<S>3383</S> toward the sunrising<S>4217</S> <S>8121</S>.
And they answered<S>6030</S> Joshua<S>3091</S>, saying<S>559</S>, All that thou commandest<S>6680</S> us we will do<S>6213</S>, and whithersoever<S>834</S> thou sendest<S>7971</S> us, we will go<S>3212</S>.
According as we hearkened<S>8085</S> unto Moses<S>4872</S> in all things, so will we hearken<S>8085</S> unto thee: only the LORD<S>3068</S> thy God<S>430</S> be with thee, as he was with Moses<S>4872</S>.
Whosoever<S>376</S> he be that doth rebel<S>4784</S> against thy commandment<S>6310</S>, and will not hearken<S>8085</S> unto thy words<S>1697</S> in all that thou commandest<S>6680</S> him, he shall be put to death<S>4191</S>: only be strong<S>2388</S> and of a good courage<S>553</S>.
